allow: Bash(# Check auth logs from overnight echo ""=== Authentication requests \(last 24h\) ==="" journalctl -u polkit --since ""yesterday"")

Bash(# Check what was happening around that time echo ""=== System activity around 08:22 ==="" journalctl --since ""2026-02-04 08:20"" --until ""2026-02-04 08:25"" | grep -v ""polkitd\\|wrangler\\|node"" | head -30 echo -e ""\\n=== Any cron jobs that ran overnight? ==="" grep -r ""CRON"" /var/log/syslog* | grep ""Feb 4"" | tail -10 echo -e ""\\n=== Scheduled tasks \(anacron/at\) ==="" cat /var/spool/anacron/* && head -20 ~/.local/share/recently-used.xbel)
